code.description: Short constant description of the error

message.description: Detailed description of the error and resolution suggestions

Kind.description: Describes an Azure resource with kind

alertNotifications.description: Whether to send security alerts notifications to the listed security contacts

alertsToAdmins.description: Whether to send security alerts notifications to subscription admins

Pricing.description: Pricing tier will be applied for the scope based on the resource ID

WorkspaceSetting.description: Configures where to store the OMS agent data for workspaces under a scope

workspaceId.description: The full Azure ID of the workspace

scope.description: All the VMs in the scope will send their security data to the mentioned workspace unless overridden by a setting with more specific scope

OperationList.description: List of possible operations for Microsoft.Security

Operation.description: Possible operation in the REST API of Microsoft.Security

Location.description: The ASC location of the subscription is in the "name" field

properties.description: The Compliance score (percentage) of a Subscription is a sum of all Resources' Compliances under the given Subscription. A Resource Compliance is defined as the compliant ('healthy') Policy Definitions out of all Policy Definitions applicable to a given resource.

assessmentTimestampUtc.description: The timestamp when the Compliance calculation was conducted.

resourceCount.description: The resource count of the given subscription for which the Compliance calculation was conducted (needed for Management Group Compliance calculation).

assessmentResult.description: An array of segment, which is the actually the compliance assessment.

SegmentList.description: List of segments which comprise the compliance assessment.

Segment.description: A segment of a compliance assessment.

SegmentType.description: The segment type, e.g. compliant, non-compliance, insufficient coverage, N/A, etc.

ResourceGroupName.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

ExtendedResourceProvider.name: extendedResourceProvider
ExtendedResourceProvider.description: Resource provider name of the base resource

ExtendedResourceName.name: extendedResourceName
ExtendedResourceName.description: The name of the base resource

AscLocation.name: asc-location
AscLocation.description: The location where ASC stores the data of the subscription. can be retrieved from Get locations

SecurityContactName.name: securityContactName
SecurityContactName.description: Name of the security contact object
